snippet.title: Looney Tunes: Twouble! - GBC Longplay/Walkthrough #4 [720p]
snippet.description:
Gameboy Color: Looney Tunes: Twouble!

Rating: 2/5

This game is not very fun in my opinion and thats why I give it the two. It's not a bad game but walking around gets so tedious and the 2d levels aren't very fun either. I wouldn't recommend this game unless you really like looney tunes and puzzle games.
